alert.note: Alert for Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hancock and south central Penobscot Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orono, or near Old Town, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bangor, Old Town, Orono, Brewer, Veazie, Indian Island, Glenburn, Holden, Milford, Eddington, Bradley, Clifton, Otis, Mariaville, Waltham, Amherst, Aurora and Great Pond. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 185 and 196. State Highway 9 between Eddington and Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
